title: Serif Face
content:
Hello All,

Looking it ID this font - the image has a couple of styles of the font.

Thanks for your help.  
George

comments.content: [Engravers Bold](http://web.archive.org/web/20140831061036/http:/www.myfonts.com/search/engravers)/ [Chevalier](http://web.archive.org/web/20140831061036/http:/www.myfonts.com/search/chevalier) (you can pick [Engravers DT](http://web.archive.org/web/20140831061036/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/dtptypes/engravers-dt/) which include these 2 versions of Engravers in a single family)
